update.foreach: INTO CHART_RESTAURANT (AREA_CODE, SIGUNGU_CODE, VISITOR_NUMBER, RESTAURANT_NAME, RESTAURANT_TYPE, YEAR_MONTH) VALUES (TO_NUMBER(#{item.areaCode}),TO_NUMBER(#{item.sigunguCode}),TO_NUMBER(#{item.visitorNumber}),#{item.restaurantName},#{item.restaurantType},#{item.yearMonth})

INTO CHART_ATTRACTION (AREA_CODE, SIGUNGU_CODE, ATTRACTION_NAME, ATTRACTION_TYPE, VISITOR_NUMBER, YEAR_MONTH) VALUES (TO_NUMBER(#{item.areaCode}),TO_NUMBER(#{item.sigunguCode}),#{item.attractionName},#{item.attractionType},TO_NUMBER(#{item.visitorNumber}),#{item.yearMonth})
INTO CHART_VISITOR (AREA_CODE, SIGUNGU_CODE, VISITOR_NUMBER, YEAR_MONTH) VALUES (TO_NUMBER(#{item.areaCode}),TO_NUMBER(#{item.sigunguCode}),TO_NUMBER(#{item.visitorNumber}),#{item.yearMonth})
INTO CHART_SNS (AREA_CODE, SIGUNGU_CODE, SEARCH_NUMBER, YEAR_MONTH) VALUES (TO_NUMBER(#{item.areaCode}),TO_NUMBER(#{item.sigunguCode}),TO_NUMBER(#{item.searchNumber}),#{item.yearMonth})

INTO CHART_FELLOW (AREA_CODE, SIGUNGU_CODE, FELLOW_TYPE, SEARCH_NUMBER, YEAR_MONTH) VALUES (TO_NUMBER(#{item.areaCode}),TO_NUMBER(#{item.sigunguCode}),#{item.fellowType}, TO_NUMBER(#{item.searchNumber}),#{item.yearMonth})

INTO CHART_TRIP (AREA_CODE, SIGUNGU_CODE, TRIP_TYPE, SEARCH_NUMBER, YEAR_MONTH) VALUES (TO_NUMBER(#{item.areaCode}),TO_NUMBER(#{item.sigunguCode}),#{item.tripType}, TO_NUMBER(#{item.searchNumber}),#{item.yearMonth})
